item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. Paraguay Loves Mickey, the Cartoon Mouse. Disney Doesn't (151 points | 84 comments)
27. Bitcoin puzzle #66 was solved: 6.6 BTC (~$400k) withdrawn (386 points | 326 comments)
